sentence.Network_en: Don't be so doctrinaire about things.
sentence.Network_cn: 别那样用理论去解释事物.

sentence.Network_en: He is firm but not doctrinaire.
The continuing debate between government and the press has not been much advanced by doctrinaire arguments.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府和新闻界之间不停的辩论,并没有因一些空洞的观点而有所进展.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 最新GMAT词汇精选 - 豆丁网 ... divergence n． 分歧，分开 doctrinaire n． 空论家， dolt n． 笨蛋，傻瓜.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... concessionaire 特许权所有人 doctrinaire 教条主义者 personal 个人的.
docility 可塑性doctrinaire 空谈理论者doctrinairism 教条主义
英语常用词根 - 豆丁网 ... doctrine 教义，教条 doctrinaire 空谈家,教条的 docile a 可教的；温顺的.

list.abs: It is such doctrinaire thinking and stark partisanship that have turned Americans off of politics ., 正是这样的教条主义和党派偏见使美国没有什么政治可言.
doctrinaire attitudes , beliefs , criticisms ., 教条主义的态度 , 信条 , 批评.
... 理论家，空谈家- -doctrinaire pedant theorist 残忍的，野蛮的- -ferocious bloodthirsty brutal cruel fierce vicious wild.
temper its doctrinaire logic with a little practical wisdom ., 用一点实践智慧调和其纯理论的逻辑.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French, from doctrine (see doctrine)

entry.tran: 空谈理论的;脱离实际的;教条主义的
entry.def: If you say that someone is doctrinaire or has a doctrinaire attitude, you disapprove of them because they have fixed principles which they try to force on other people.

example.ex: He is firm but not doctrinaire.

means.word_mean: 1. a stubborn person of arbitrary or arrogant opinions
1. stubbornly insistent on theory without regard for practicality or suitability

auth_sentence.content: To doctrinaire modernists, that was a mortal sin.
auth_sentence.res_content: To doctrinaire modernists, that was a mortal sin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To doctrinaire modernists, that was a mortal sin.

auth_sentence.content: I don't want to be doctrinaire about it.
auth_sentence.res_content: I don't want to be doctrinaire about it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I don't want to be doctrinaire about it.

auth_sentence.content: The students were more cordial and less doctrinaire.
auth_sentence.res_content: The students were more cordial and less doctrinaire.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The students were more cordial and less doctrinaire.
